transcript.title: World Heritage Listing: Sydney Opera House
transcript.content:
I am delighted that the Sydney Opera House has been inscribed on the World Heritage List.
The Opera House, and its setting at Bennelong Point on Sydney Harbour, is an iconic and treasured place, not just for Australians but also internationally.
The Sydney Opera House, as an outstanding example of 20th Century architecture, is a testament to the daring of architect J
